item.title: Cookie Run Kingdom Codes (September 2024)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Cookie Run Kingdom Codes
  • Cookie Run Kingdom Social Media
  • How to Redeem Codes in Cookie Run Kingdom

While not required for gameplay, Cookie Run Kingdom has offered many different special codes to help players toward their gacha pulls. These codes can be found on various official social media pages such as Twitter and YouTube.

Updated September 21, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: There is only one active code available now that you can redeem to get valuable rewards. However, the developers add new ones from time to time, so check back later, and maybe we'll find more freebies.

All Cookie Run Kingdom Codes

Active Cookie Run Kingdom Codes

  • NDRUNNERCOMBO441 (3,000x Crystals, 3,000x Rainbow Cubes, 1,000x Choco Chalks, 10x Fateful Cookie Cutters, 150x Radiant Beascuit Dough)

Expired Cookie Run Kingdom Codes

  • MYCOOKIECHIMCHAK (3,000x Crystals, 1,500x Rainbow Cubes, 1,000x Choco Chalks, 300x Juicy Stamina Jellies)
  • HAPPYDISCORDBDAY (3,000x Crystals and 500x Rainbow Cubes)
  • COOKIERUNBRAVE15 (1,500 Crystals)
  • UPDATEFIRSTCREAM (1,500 Crystals, 300x Rainbow Cubes)
  • LOVEWITCHSCASTLE (1,500 Crystals, 300x Rainbow Cubes)
  • MISSEARTHBREAD24 (3,000 Crystals, 1,000x Rainbow Cubes)
  • CRK3RDANNIVERSARYT (500,000x Coins)
  • CRK3RDANNIVERSARYAS (5x Special Cookie Cutter)
  • CRK3RDANNIVERSARYBE (500x Rainbow Cubes)
  • FROMKINGDOMWITHLOVE (1,500x Rainbow Cubes, 3,000x Crystals)
  • INCRK3RDANNIVERSARY (1,000 Crystals)
  • CRK3RDANNIVERSARYST (500,000 Coins)
  • WELCOMETOBEASTYEAST (3,000x Crystals, 1,500x Rainbow Cubes, 10x Aurora Pillars, 10x Aurora Bricks, 10x Aurora Compass, 10x Magic Cookie Cutters, 100x EXP Star Jellies Lv.6, 250,000x Coins)
  • CRK3RDANNIVERSARYA (150x Topping Pieces)
  • CRK3RDANNIVERSARYYE (5x Magic Cookie Cutter)
  • GOOGLEPLAY2023 (3,000 Crystals and 1,000 Rainbow Cubes)
  • CRKINDONESIA (3,000 Crystals)
  • BEWAREOFTHEMERGELCS (3000 Crystals)
  • CRKALWAYSLOVEYOU (1000 Radiant Shards, 30 Time Jumpers, 1500 Rainbow Cubes, 3000 Crystals, 10 Magic Cookie Cutters, 100 EXP Star Jelly Lv. 6, 250000 Coins, 100 Topping Pieces, 8 Aurora Compass', 8 Aurora Pillars, 8 Aurora Bricks)
  • CRK2NDBIRTHDAYD1 (100 EXP Star Jelly Lv. 6)
  • CRK2NDBIRTHDAYD2 (3 Aurora Compass', 3 Aurora Pillars, 3 Aurora Bricks)
  • CRK2NDBIRTHDAYD3 (100 Topping Pieces)
  • CRK2NDBIRTHDAYD4 (500 Rainbow Cubes)
  • CRK2NDBIRTHDAYD5 (30 Time Jumpers)
  • CRK2NDBIRTHDAYD6 (10 Treasure Tickets)
  • CRK2NDBIRTHDAYD7 (3 Special Cookie Cutters)

Cookie Run Kingdom Social Media

There are multiple English social media accounts owned by the Cookie Run Kingdom staff. By following these accounts, players will be able to discover new redeemable codes when they are first released to the public. Some of these accounts are:

CRKingdomEN - Twitter

Cookie Run: Kingdom - YouTube

CRKingdomEN - Facebook

CookieRunKingdom - Instagram

CookieRun_En - TikTok

How to Redeem Codes in Cookie Run Kingdom

It is important to know that publicly released codes can only be used once per DevPlay account and cannot be endlessly used in one kingdom.

For the majority of players, the coupon redemption screen can be found by first entering the menu in the top right corner of the screen while outside of battle. In this menu, select the Coupons button to open up the web browser to the redemption screen.

Players who do not have the option to go directly to the redemption screen from in-game can still enter it by going to this website.

In order to enter a code, players need to have both a code and the name of their DevPlay account. Players can find the name of their DevPlay account by going into Cookie Run Kingdom 's Settings menu. From here, the name of the DevPlay account being used at the time can be found in the upper left corner of the Info tab. If the DevPlay account is an email address, the entire email address needs to be entered on the code redemption screen.

Once the process is complete, rewards will be received in the Mailbox and players can claim them right away.

item.title: The Wildest Fan Theories of the Pokemon Franchise Explained
item.description:
The Pokemon franchise is a veritable multimedia empire, with even its hugely successful games dwarfed by its shows, films, and merchandising. Its ubiquity across the childhoods of so many millions has made Pokemon ripe for theorycrafting, with a sizable portion of fan speculation taking the series' established lore to radical heights.

When Pokemon first burst onto the scene in 1996, its show and a host of merchandising soon followed. The simple core concept combined with an immense bestiary of lovable creatures brought on the 'Pokemania' phenomenon, ensuring the franchise's worldwide dominance over pop culture. With how integral it was in the childhoods of many teens and adults today, older fans can't help but look back at the series with fresh lenses—reinterpreting all the elements that confused or went over their heads as kids. From the chilling atmosphere of the original Pokemon 's Lavender Town to hidden lore unearthed by plotholes, there are few corners of the franchise that fans haven't mined for theories and fanon.

Pokemon's Wild Fan Theories Explained

The Player Killed Gary's Raticate

The murder of Gary's Raticate is central to one of Pokemon 's oldest fan theories. The theory posits that, due to the Raticate disappearing from the rival's lineup after their fourth encounter, the player must have killed them. This is spurred on by the fact that Raticate is the only Pokemon to disappear from the rival's squad, as well as the fact that the fifth encounter takes place in Pokemon Tower—a cemetery for the little creatures situated in the eerie Lavender Town. The player's rival even asks "What brings you here? Your Pokemon don't look dead!", bringing into question why he himself is there.

Lavender Town's infamous gloom envelops this theory like a miasma, and if it were true it would upset the perception of child-friendly fun Pokemon relies on. However, this theory is one that may be too wild to believe. For example, YouTube user KoolGoldFinch long ago noticed that Gary's Raticate and Rattata levels don't suggest an evolution, meaning that the rival would already have swapped combatants before. Moreover, there are far more powerful Pokemon than Raticate, so swapping them out makes more sense than the critter's death.

Nurse Joy Is A Pokémon

Many fans have come to the conclusion that Nurse Joy is a Pokemon, with one of the earlier recorded instances of this theory being a Reddit post by user Bkwordguy. Though fans have many theories as to why there are so many identical Nurse Joys running around, this one posits that 'Nurse Joy' is a type of Pokemon—just an exceptionally humanoid one. This hypothesis, which is also used to explain the abundance of Officer Jennys, checks out in a number of ways; Pokemon are established as having largely uniform characteristics and behaviors, not to mention that Pokemon like Meowth have developed speech.

The Great Pokemon War

One line of dialogue in Pokemon FireRed and LeafGreen sparked many fan theories. In this game, Lt. Surge references how Electric Pokemon saved him 'during the war.' This war, one that apparently saw humans use Pokemon in combat, has major implications for the lore if true. Even with the darker descriptions riddled throughout the Pokedex, this is inserted into the player's face in a way that really breaks the wholesome facade. Further, the concept of war seems to have been largely dropped from future games, with this instance being its sole mention.

The biggest speculation around this Pokemon war by fans is that it's the reason that there are so few adult men in areas like the Kanto region, particularly in earlier generations. It's also been suggested that the impetus behind this war was a rivalry between Johto and Kanto. Whatever the reason, it had to have been incredibly significant to be denoted via 'the war,' rather than a more specific moniker.

item.title: Roblox: Meme Sea Codes (September 2024)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Meme Sea Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes in Meme Sea
  • How to Get More Meme Sea Codes

Meme Sea is a fascinating adventure RPG. Instead of ordinary enemies, such as monsters or undead, players will encounter characters from popular memes. This interesting feature made Meme Sea popular and made it stand out from similar Roblox games.

You can redeem Meme Sea codes to quickly improve your character and have decent capital from the very beginning. Each code offers generous rewards from the developers, mostly currency that will definitely come in handy in your adventures.

Updated September 21, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: Below you can find all the active codes, but keep in mind that you need level 25 to redeem them. If you're looking for more freebies, save this article and come back later.

All Meme Sea Codes

Working Meme Sea Codes

  • 100MVisits - Redeem this code for Cash and Gems.
  • 100KLikes - Redeem this code for Cash and Gems.
  • 100KFavorites - Redeem this code for Cash and Gems.
  • 100KActive - Redeem this code for Cash and Gems.
  • 70KActive - Redeem this code to get 1,000 Gems.
  • 10KMembers - Redeem this code to get 100 Gems.
  • Update4 - Redeem this code to get 400,000 Cash and 40 Gems.
  • 10KLikes - Redeem this code to get 100 Gems.

Expired Meme Sea Codes

  • 10MVisits
  • 40KActive
  • 20KActive
  • 10KActive
  • 4KActive
  • 9MVisits
  • 8MVisits
  • MemeSeaRelease
  • ThankFor100KVisits
  • ThankFor1KActive
  • sorryforshutdown
  • ThankFor2MVisits
  • ThankFor3MVisits
  • ThankFor200KVisits
  • ThankFor1MVisits
  • ThankFor4MVisits
  • ThankFor1KLikes

Redeeming Meme Sea codes is a quick and easy way to earn money, so if you're a newbie or in need of currency, be sure to take advantage of this opportunity.

How to Redeem Codes in Meme Sea

Redeeming Meme Sea codes is not difficult, and the process is similar to that in other Roblox games, so it will only take a few clicks. However, if you are experiencing difficulties with redeeming Meme Sea codes, don't worry, just follow the instructions below:

  • Launch Meme Sea .
  • Pay attention to the lower-left corner of the screen. Here, above the Menu button , you will see several more buttons in a row. Among them, interact with the second one with the gear icon.
  • After opening the new menu, scroll to the bottom until you see the redemption section . There will be an input field and a grey button with a triangle icon next to it. Now, manually enter or copy and paste one of the above-mentioned active codes into the input field.
  • Lastly, click the grey button with the triangle icon to submit your reward request.

If everything is done correctly, a notification with a list of rewards received will appear above the settings menu.

How to Get More Meme Sea Codes

To be one of the first to find the new Roblox codes and receive rewards, you must closely monitor the game's official social media. The developers of Meme Sea , like the creators of other Roblox games, publish new codes in their official Roblox group and page, as well as on their Discord server.

item.title: Nobody’s Adventure Chop-Chop Codes (September 2024)
item.description:
Nobody's Adventure Chop-Chop is one of the representatives of the idle RPG games. In it, you have to choose one of the weak monsters and evolve them into an immortal creature. To do this, players have to farm and invest a lot of resources. And if you want to save time, then Nobody’s Adventure Chop-Chop codes are just what you need.

With these codes, you can get a lot of different resources, such as Beast Fruits, Peaches, Jade, and many others. They will help you make your character stronger and defeat any enemies on your way.

All Nobody’s Adventure Chop-Chop Codes

Working Nobody’s Adventure Chop-Chop Codes

  • HAPPY1225 - Redeem this code to get x1000 Beast Fruit, x50 Peach, x1 Binding Charm, x50 Celestial Charm, x50 Jade, and x100 Beast Seal
  • HAPPY888 - Redeem this code to get 1000x Beast Fruit, 20x Vitreous Orb, 120x Spirit Blossom, and 2000x Spiritstone
  • BIRD888 - Redeem this code to get 50x Peach, 50x Jade, 1x Binding Charm,and 50x Spirit Blossom
  • Pig888 - Redeem this code to get 200x Peach, 500x Jade, 5x Binding Charm, and 40x Beast Seal
  • LETSCHOP - Redeem this code to get x2000 Beast Fruit and x30 Peach
  • Big888 - Redeem this code to get 2000x Beast Fruit, 50x Peach, 100x Jade, and 10K Spiritstone
  • Tree888 - Redeem this code to get 100x Peach, 100x Jade, 2x Binding Charm, and 100x Spirit Blossom
  • FISH888 - Redeem this code to get 500x Beast Fruit, 10K Spiritstone, 10x Vitreous Orb, and 60x Spirit Blossom
  • HAPPY2024 - Redeem this code to get x1000 Beast Fruit, x50 Peach, x1 Binding Charm, x50 Celestial Charm, x50 Jade, and x100 Beast Sea

Expired Nobody’s Adventure Chop-Chop Codes

  • HAPPYDAY
  • DADSDAY

Most of the time, you will be chopping down the Divine Tree in Nobody’s Adventure Chop-Chop . This will give you EXP, resources, and most importantly, equipment. The latter will vary in stats and rarity. But if you want to get better items, you will need to upgrade the Divine Tree with different resources. Luckily, many of them can be obtained using Nobody’s Adventure Chop-Chop codes.

Each of these codes is a great source of rewards, as they contain a variety of items. Some of them can even reward you with 500 Beast Fruits. Therefore, you should use the codes while they are still active.

How to Redeem Nobody’s Adventure Chop-Chop Codes

Like in other mobile titles, using Nobody’s Adventure Chop-Chop codes is very simple. Players only need to make a few taps. For convenience, follow these steps:

  • Launch Nobody’s Adventure Chop-Chop .
  • Then, click on the character icon in the upper left corner.
  • After that, tap on the User Center button and select the Gift Code Exchange option.
  • Finally, enter one of the codes and solve the captcha to get the well-deserved rewards.

How to Get More Nobody’s Adventure Chop-Chop Codes

Similar to Roblox codes, the developers add a lot of codes to Nobody’s Adventure Chop-Chop . And in order not to miss new ones, you should follow the official social media page of the game:

  • Nobody’s Adventure Chop-Chop Facebook page

Nobody’s Adventure Chop-Chop is available on mobile devices.

item.title: Roblox: Legends of Speed Codes (September 2024)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Legends of Speed Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes in Legends of Speed
  • How to Get More Legends of Speed Codes
  • Legends of Speed Tips and Tricks
  • The Best Roblox Games Like Legends of Speed
  • About the Legends of Speed Developers

In this article, Roblox fans will find a list of codes for Legends of Speed , as well as other valuable information about the game. Redeeming Legends of Speed codes can significantly increase Roblox players' speed, as well as provide a few extra gems. With this in mind, it's a good idea to redeem all of them to get as many additional freebies as possible.

Updated September 21, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: We try to keep the information in this article as up-to-date as possible. So you can always come back here and check for new freebies.

All Legends of Speed Codes

Legends of Speed is not new, but the developers are updating it, and adding codes to improve the player's experience. Active codes that can help players in the game are listed below.

Codes Checked on September 21, 2024.

All Active Legends of Speed Codes

  • speedchampion000 - Use for 5,000 Gems.
  • racer300 - Use for 300 Steps.
  • SPRINT250 - Use this code for 250 Steps.
  • hyper250 - Use this code for 250 Steps.
  • legends500 - Use this code for 500 Gems.
  • sparkles300 - Use this code for 300 Gems.
  • Launch200 - Use this code for 200 Gems.

All Expired Legends of Speed Codes

There are no expired codes in the game, but active codes may soon become inactive, so players should hurry up and use them.

How to Redeem Codes in Legends of Speed

Just like in most other Roblox games, redeeming codes in Roblox : Legends of Speed is a very simple task that any user can handle. Everything that needs to be done to redeem codes is described in the short text instructions below:

  • Open Roblox and launch Legends of Speed .
  • Find the blue “Codes” button on the main screen of the game.
  • Click on this button.
  • Enter the offered code in the field that says "Type Code Here."

How to Get More Legends of Speed Codes

To obtain additional codes for the Legends of Speed game, players may check the page of the game developer on Twitter. Additionally, players may frequently monitor this article, which is periodically updated with new codes. It is recommended that players use the active codes as soon as possible before they expire.

Legends of Speed Tips and Tricks

After redeeming the above-mentioned codes, players should try to earn Gems for achieving a certain speed, since this will also give them a good starting point. It is worth finding a slot machine with pets and buying some there, which will give players a little boost as well. After that, all they have to do is walk around and collect spheres, as well as jump through the rings. When players are confident enough in their abilities, they can participate in races.

The Best Roblox Games Like Legends of Speed

Although it has quite interesting gameplay, there are plenty of other great Roblox games like Legends of Speed . The ones listed below have similar mechanics, so they are sure to appeal to Legends of Speed fans who are starting to grow tired of the game:

  • Legend of Heroes Simulator
  • Dragon Race
  • Race Clicker
  • Car Dealership Tycoon
  • Cart Ride Simulator

About the Legends of Speed Developers

Legends of Speed was created by very productive developers, Scriptbloxian Studios. Besides this game, they have created many other interesting games that are also worthy of attention:

  • Ninja Legends
  • Ninja Legends 2
  • Drilling Simulator
  • Muscle Legends
